EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Stream Processing in the Cloud w/Data Microservices.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Stream Processing in the Cloud with Data Microservices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Stream Processing in the Cloud with Data Microservices on Tuesday, March 22, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, March 22, 2016
Time: 3:00PM (London, BST)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1155067/157E3088E5F32497B5D13358FD9BE7A4]]>
Audio Information:
This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
{{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
